title: Motley Fool Money: 5.21.2010
description: On this week's Motley Fool Money Radio Show, we discuss financial reform, Google television, and Kevin Costner's slick technology. We talk intuition and investing with Christopher Chabris, co-author of The Invisible Gorilla: And Other Ways Our Intuitions Deceive Us. And we share some stocks on our radar.
content:encoded: On this week's Motley Fool Money Radio Show, we discuss financial reform, Google television, and Kevin Costner's slick technology.
